troov

The simplest way to shop for your home.

The Team

We are three friends who met in Freshers' week at Oxford University 5 years ago. We are interior design enthusiasts aiming to make it easier for you to find the perfect items to suit your home and your price range.

Sean is our product man. After graduating from Oxford University in 2012 with a First in Geography, he ran the university's entrepreneurship club, Oxford Entrepreneurs. After travelling the world - to S. America and Asia, and learning how to code, Sean's now dedicating himself to helping troov's members find the best designed furniture at a price that suits their budget.

Natalie focuses on Design, Marketing and Business Development at troov. After graduating from Oxford University with a First in French Language and Literature, she worked for a financial services company before deciding to explore the world of startups. She learnt to code, worked on some freelance web design projects, and she is now determined to make good interior design more easily accessible through troov.

Mark likes to push technology to its limits, having achieved his Masters in Bioinformatics, he has eagerly turned his attention to the big data side of product recommendation and UX design. Aside from burying his head in algorithms, Mark likes long walks on the beach, and Tuesdays.

Don't forget to sign up to our mailing list!
